A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is by far one of the best Star Wars movies I've experienced.  I felt like a kid again watching this.  I laughed\, cried\, was shocked\, cheered\, felt thrilled - so many emotions while watching this.  The beauty of it is that it's a subtle nod to the OT and Prequels.  For deep fans of the franchise they'll get it; no explanation necessary.  For casual fans\, it may be hard to digest.  But don't be fooled; this is a real fans movie.  Sure there were some very minor things that I would've liked to see in my head\, but I would've never guessed what happened.  That's the brilliance of it.  I think truly great art will have a divided audience which is what we're seeing here.  I think time will tell how brilliant this film is.  Can't wait to see it again!
